name: Mitigation Playbook for Unauthorized Web Access Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an unauthorized user accessed the internal network via a compromised web application and exfiltrated sensitive data over HTTP.

parallel--1b2c3d4e-5f8a-49ab-b113-0988ff.name: Mitigation Actions
parallel--1b2c3d4e-5f8a-49ab-b113-0988ff.description: Block suspicious IP and kill malicious scripts while scanning for web shells

action--bc8fee49-c18b-4a76-a31e-79bc6054.name: Block outbound traffic to suspicious IP
action--bc8fee49-c18b-4a76-a31e-79bc6054.description: Block the outbound traffic to the identified suspicious external IP address.

action--e461ffae-532c-4f0b-8f62-8d4da408.name: Kill malicious process
action--e461ffae-532c-4f0b-8f62-8d4da408.description: Terminate any processes associated with the suspicious script.

loop--955e77f3-6994-41e7-a7ad-349e8df160.name: Scan for additional web shells
loop--955e77f3-6994-41e7-a7ad-349e8df160.description: Repeat scanning for web shells until the scan is clean.

action--955e77f3-6994-41e7-a7ad-349e8df1.name: Run ClamAV scan
action--955e77f3-6994-41e7-a7ad-349e8df1.description: Perform a recursive scan of the web directory to find any additional web shells.
